reviewText: My husband loves Vicente Fernandez movies so I thought I have to get this for him, especially since it had 4-5 movies on it. It was part of his Christmas gift but I let him open it early. He was so happy, loved the gift. He put the movies on that night and each one played perfectly. It was inexpensive and fast shipping. Definitely recommend.
i loved the movies is so hard to find these type of movies in good condition! I had to exchange mine because one of the DVDs was scratched but I loeve them!
